group_1.textRight: ...I'm sorry, but I think I'll stay home @from school today.

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry. Sana is there for her.
...See, they're doing some online coursework @together right now.

group_1.textRight: Again, I'm sorry...but thank you.
...I'm going to go for a little walk. @I feel so restless...

group_1.textCenter: (...Oh, my feet somehow took me here...)
(I suppose...I might as well pay my respects @to Mizuna Shrine, right...?)
(I wonder if God...will make it so...)
...May the world be a happy place for us all.

group_1.textRight: Damn, girl, that's kind of a big ask, @don't you think?
Like, peace and love for everyone is the ideal, @but that's all it is, right?

group_1.textLeft: I know it's just a naive ideal, but...

group_1.textRight: Oh, shoot, sorry! I wasn't trying to make @you cry or anything...!

group_1.narration: I began crying and everything just spilled out, @and the girl, Himena, listened patiently @to every word as I explained everything.

group_1.textRight: So that's what's up... Well, you're awfully kind, @that's for sure, Iroha.
Oh, no, you're gucci!
Like, I'm the one who butted in on you, @if anything!
See, this shrine's known for being all @about love and marriage,
and since we seem to be close in age, I thought @you were making a wish like that, too.
Well, like, there's a legend about this shrine @that goes like...

group_1.narration: "Once upon a time, a man and woman @from two different stations fell in love, @but the man was killed... The woman, devastated, @prayed to the god of this shrine, and asked:"
"Please let me see the man I love again..."

group_1.textRight: And then she met her lover again as a ghost @or some shit like that.

group_1.textLeft: So were you here to make a wish @for love, Himena?

group_1.textRight: Well, it's like, the tragedy that comes when @the people around you don't accept who you love...
I feel that.
The world's full of stories like that...
Irorin, what you just told me about bullying @and despair... Both stories are one and the same.
Why the hell don't we all just try to understand @and accept one another...?
And Kamihama's, like, got a big divide between @the East and the West, right?

group_1.narration: "Word on the street says that a little while ago, @a girl tried knocking another student down the stairs, @and was expelled as a result. @And the girl said to have done it. @Mitama or something...attempted suicide."
"Humans are so fucked up... @Where you were born, your family, @your appearances, your personality... @Aren't each of those things just one aspect of you?"
"And yet people will bully others @relentlessly over it, and they don't give a shit @if it kills the other person or not."
"And if shit goes sideways, they can just be like, @'Oh, I didn't mean to bully them!' @And then you have all those people who see @something wrong and just look the other way."
"People just have to look past appearances @and actually try to get to know the other person... @Get a little closer to them, and then..."

group_1.textRight: Then...they would've seen how amazing @Hiko is, and...
Ah, sorry, got myself worked up there.
Hiko is my boyfriend, and he's seriously @the bestâ˜…

group_1.textLeft: Oh, so you came here for him...

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102801:eyeClose_1][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]*Sigh* Well, Irorin...
Maybe you'll never make the whole world happy.
But you're still aiming for that future?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes. Even if it's naive of me, I want everyone @to be happy.
I don't want to give up on that ideal.

group_1.textRight: You've got me in your corner, then.
If we could all actually understand each other...
If we could make that future happen, @I think I'd be happy with that.
And hey, there's not much you can do @if you're depressed, yeah?
Looking backwards won't get you anywhere.
You gotta look forward! Kyahaâ˜…

group_1.textLeft: Yes...you're right...! @I feel like things are clearer now.

group_1.textRight: Hey, if it helped you out, @we are oh- and -kay for now!
...This cutie's got some big plans @for the future.
Gonna be for the happiness of just @the two of us. Me and Hiko.
So keep your eyes peeled, and remember me!

group_1.textLeft: I will! I'd love to meet and talk with you again!

group_1.textRight: Alrighty, here's my contact info!
I'll give you the heads up if I pull off my plan!

group_1.textLeft: ...Got it. I'll be waiting for your report.

group_1.textRight: Okay, then, now to just finish up my prayers @and head home.
I'm sure people will never forgive me @for what I'm about to pull, but hey.

group_1.narration: "My mom, my teachers, Irorin, @and even God won't ever forgive me, @and I know this isn't a good thing to do...@but it's the best thing I can do."

group_1.textRight: See you soonâ˜…

group_1.textCenter: Won't be forgiven... Is she planning to elope @or something...?
...Still, Himena seems to be trying her best.
I have to work hard, too.

group_1.narration: But... Everyone wants to be happy, @but if we all can't understand each other, @that won't ever happen... @So how can I help us bridge that understanding?
Let me ask Yachiyo and the others about it.
